mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.lesson_id, t1.problem_id, t1.problem_name, t1.problem_type, t1.score, t1.begin_time, t1.end_time, t1.sort, t1.type from lesson_problem t1 left JOIN (select id,stu_id,lesson_id,checkin_time,status,roll_call,create_time,update_time from lesson_attend_log where stu_id=#{studentId}) t2 ON t1.lesson_id=t2.lesson_id where t1.wechat_status=0 order by begin_time asc

select id, lesson_id, problem_id, problem_name, problem_type, score, begin_time, end_time, sort, type from (SELECT t1.id, t1.lesson_id, t1.problem_id, t1.problem_name, t1.problem_type, t1.score, t1.begin_time, t1.end_time, t1.sort, t1.type, (SELECT id from judge_record t3 where t3.problem_id=t1.problem_id and t3.user_id=#{query.StudentId} limit 1) as record FROM ( SELECT id,stu_id,lesson_id,checkin_time,status,roll_call,create_time,update_time FROM lesson_attend_log WHERE stu_id =#{query.StudentId} ) t2 LEFT JOIN lesson_problem t1 ON t2.lesson_id = t1.lesson_id ORDER BY begin_time ASC) t4 where t4.record is null
